verbose_text: They showed that both MLF and AIF demonstrated the most potent cytotoxicity with IC 50 of ~ 20 muM in HL60 cells and could induce apoptosis through inhibition of NF-kB factor (through the signal transducer of activation (STAT) pathway) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: AIF demonstrated the most potent cytotoxicity with IC 50  of ~20 muM in HL60 cells and could induce apoptosis
